description: [SDBbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0461) has the ability to record video on a compromised host.(Citation: Proofpoint TA505 October 2019)(Citation: IBM TA505 April 2020)

external_references.description: Schwarz, D. et al. (2019, October 16). TA505 Distributes New SDBbot Remote Access Trojan with Get2 Downloader. Retrieved May 29, 2020.
Frydrych, M. (2020, April 14). TA505 Continues to Infect Networks With SDBbot RAT. Retrieved May 29, 2020.
